TextView.android:text: This is my first Android app, now 'usable' by the public. It was created because I wanted to combine my two interests: programming and learning about animals, especially fish. I hope you will find as much enjoyment using the program as I did developing it. Another simple reason it was born is the simple fact that I needed a project to showcase at University.
Developed by Máté Vajas, a.k.a. Letsktor.
